column4: mobɔhwehwɛ wo ahema: Wo ho nsukɔm dze me kra
column6: Wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ a atɔ bitsi a nsu nnyi do do."

column2: "Dɛmara na mahwɛ wo wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ
column3: Dɛ mubohu wo tum na w’enyimnyam."

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ w’adɔyɛ ye sen nkwa ntsi: M’anofamfa beyi wo ayɛw."
"Dɛm ntsi metse ase yi mibehyira wo; Mebɛma me nsa do wɔ wo dzin mu."
"Ɔbɛmee me kra dɛ ehuor na seradze; Na m’ano dze ahosɛpɛw anofamfa beyi wo ayɛw;"
"Sɛ mekaa wo wɔ me mpa do a
column3: Modwendwen wo ho wɔ anadwe dasu mu."
Na wo ntsaban ase nwinwin mu na mibedzi ehurusi."

column2: "Me kra dzi w’ekyir pɛpɛɛpɛ: Wo nsa enyimfa dze mo mu."
"Na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra asɛɛ no no
"Wobeyi hɔn ama afona no tum: Wɔbɛyɛ mpataku kyɛpɛn."

column3: n’enyi bɛgye wɔ Nyankopɔn mu: Obiara a ɔka ne ntam bɛhyehyɛ noho; Na wobomua hɔn a wodzi atorsɛm ano."
